Here is a list of (identified) groups/individuals who use [[http://www.monperrus.net/martin/bibtexbrowser/|bibtexbrowser]] for their publication list!

You can add your group/name by [[https://github.com/monperrus/bibtexbrowser/edit/master/bibtexbrowser-users.wiki|editing it on GitHub]].
